name: sonarqube/metrics
description: Get metrics for a SonarQube project

metrics.description: List of metric keys to retrieve (optional)

name: sonarqube/issues
description: Get issues for a SonarQube project

severities.description: List of issue severities to filter by (optional)

types.description: List of issue types to filter by (optional)

statuses.description: List of issue statuses to filter by (e.g., OPEN, CONFIRMED, RESOLVED, CLOSED) (optional)

impact_severities.description: List of impact severities to filter by (e.g., HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW) (optional)

impact_software_qualities.description: List of software qualities to filter by (e.g., MAINTAINABILITY, RELIABILITY, SECURITY) (optional)

assigned_to_me.description: Filter issues assigned to the authenticated user (optional)

assignees.description: List of assignee logins to filter by (optional)

authors.description: List of issue authors to filter by (optional)

code_variants.description: List of code variant identifiers to filter by (optional)

created_after.description: Filter issues created after the given date (format: YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

created_before.description: Filter issues created before the given date (format: YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

created_in_last.description: Filter issues created during a time span before now (e.g., '1m' for 1 month) (optional)

cwe.description: List of CWE identifiers to filter by (optional)

directories.description: List of directories to filter by (optional)

facets.description: List of facets to return in the response (optional)

files.description: List of file paths to filter by (optional)

languages.description: List of language keys to filter by (optional)

owasp_top10.description: List of OWASP Top 10 categories to filter by (optional)

owasp_top10_2021.description: List of OWASP Top 10 2021 categories to filter by (optional)

resolutions.description: List of issue resolutions to filter by (optional)

rules.description: List of rule keys to filter by (optional)

sans_top25.description: List of SANS Top 25 categories to filter by (optional)

sonarsource_security.description: List of SonarSource security categories to filter by (optional)

tags.description: List of tags to filter by (optional)

asc.description: Sort ascending if true, descending if false (optional)

name: sonarqube/quality_gate
description: Get quality gate status for a SonarQube project

name: sonarqube/projects
description: List all projects in SonarQube. Result will be a list of project_name: project_key pairs.
